name: Kotmale Lassi with Real Mango Pulp
description: Kotmale Lassi is enriched with Real Mango pulp and its made from 100% Sri Lankan Pure Fresh Cows Milk. Its Suitable for Vegetarians and inludes Probiotic. Rs. 50 cents from every 1Lt of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
